title: No Woman, No Cry
lrc:
[id: tbkdcjid]
[ar:Bob Marley]
[ti:No Woman No Cry]
[00:26.80][00:37.61][01:40.91][03:19.63]No woman no cry,
[00:32.21][00:44.33][01:44.82][01:58.93][03:27.34]no woman no cry
[00:49.85][02:03.46]Seh, seh,
[00:51.84][02:05.44]said I remember
[00:53.95]when we used to sit
[00:56.81]In a government yard in Trenchtown
[01:02.89]Obba, obba, observing the hypocrites
[01:08.86]As the would
[01:10.91]mingle with the good people we meet
[01:15.38]Good friends we have, oh, good friends we've lost
[01:21.59]Along the way
[01:29.05]In this great future,
[01:31.28]You can't forget your past
[01:34.50]So dry your tears, I seh
[01:39.48]and . . .
[01:51.78]Little darling, don't shed no tears,
[02:07.38]when we use to sit
[02:11.03]In the government yard in Trenchtown
[02:17.81]And then Georgie
[02:19.86]would make the fire lights
[02:22.77]As it was,
[02:24.08]log would burnin' through the nights
[02:28.98]Then we would cook
[02:32.90]cornmeal porridge
[02:34.82]Of which I'll share
[02:38.74]with you
[02:43.34]My feet ....
[02:44.83]is my only carriage
[02:48.80]So I've got to push on thru
[02:53.24]Oh, while I'm gone
[02:55.29][03:01.30][03:07.39][03:13.17]Everything 's gonna be alright,
[02:58.20][03:03.92][03:10.56][03:16.21]everything 's gonna be alright
[03:24.72]no, no woman
[03:30.74]Oh, my little sister
[03:34.98]Don't shed no tears
[03:36.79]No woman no cry

[00:47.42]Let them all pass all their dirty remarks (one love!);
[00:53.57]There is one question Id really love to ask (one heart!):
[00:59.62]Is there a place for the hopeless sinner,
[01:04.85]Who has hurt all mankind just to save his own beliefs?
[01:12.78]One love! what about the one heart? one heart!
[01:17.28]What about - ? lets get together and feel all right
[01:22.87]As it was in the beginning (one love!);
[01:26.58]So shall it be in the end (one heart!),
[01:29.51]All right!
[01:30.81][02:26.38][02:39.17]Give thanks and praise to the lord and I will feel all right;
[01:41.77]One more thing!
[01:43.89]Lets get together to fight this holy armagiddyon (one love!),
[01:49.81]So when the man comes there will be no, no doom (one song!).
[01:56.46]Have pity on those whose chances grows tinner;
[02:01.55]There aint no hiding place from the father of creation.
[02:07.30]Sayin: one love! what about the one heart? (one heart!)
[02:13.37]What about the - ? lets get together and feel all right.
[02:19.93]Im pleadin to mankind! (one love!);
[02:22.95]Oh, lord! (one heart) wo-ooh!
